hero.title: Trulli Heritage
hero.tagline: Dove il passato incontra il presente
footer.aboutUs.title: Chi Siamo
footer.aboutUs.text: Weâ€™re Greta and Marco, siblings born and raised in Alberobello. We love sharing the beauty of Puglia and the heritage passed down to us with fellow travelers. No matter where our journeys take us, our hearts will always remain among the trulli. We invite you to experience the magic of our home with us!
